scripts.build-deps: browserify -t babelify  -r bluebird -r lodash -r react/addons | uglifyjs -c >  public/js/el-externdeps.bundle.min.js
scripts.build-inter: browserify -t babelify -x bluebird -x lodash -x react/addons -r ./client/interactives/interactives.js:interactives -r -o public/js/el-interactives.bundle.js -d
scripts.watch-inter: watchify   -t  babelify -x bluebird -x jquery -x lodash -x react/addons -r ./client/interactives/interactives.js:interactives -r -o public/js/el-interactives.bundle.js -d -v
scripts.build-client: browserify -t babelify -x bluebird -x jquery -x lodash -x react/addons -r ./client/common/promiseutils:promiseutils -r ./client/clientapp:clientapp -r ./client/views/contentcollection-view:contentcollection-view -r ./client/views/contenttree-view:contenttree-view -r ./client/views/contenteditorpane-component:contenteditorpane-component -o public/js/el-studio.bundle.js -d
scripts.watch-client: watchify   -t babelify -x bluebird -x jquery -x lodash -x react/addons -r ./client/common/promiseutils:promiseutils -r ./client/clientapp:clientapp -r ./client/views/contentcollection-view:contentcollection-view -r ./client/views/contenttree-view:contenttree-view -r ./client/views/contenteditorpane-component:contenteditorpane-component -o public/js/el-studio.bundle.js -d -v
